resources.description: The Climate Change Knowledge Portal is a central hub of information, data and reports about climate change around the world. With this portal you can query, map, compare, chart and summarize key climate and climate-related information.
resources.name: Climate Change Knowledge Portal

resources.description: Climate For Development is a map-based micro-site that illustrates the links between climate change and development. The data used on Climate For Development may be downloaded directly from the site or as map layers via the MapBox API.
resources.name: Climate For Development

resources.description: The World Bank provides free and open access to a comprehensive set of data about development in countries around the globe, together with other datasets cited in the data catalog. The Open Data Catalog is a listing of available World Bank datasets, including databases, pre-formatted tables and reports.
resources.name: Open Climate Data

name: world-bank-climate-knowledge
notes: The Climate Change Knowledge Portal (CCKP) Beta is a central hub of information, data and reports about climate change around the world. Here you can query, map, compare, chart and summarize key climate and climate-related information.
title: World Bank Climate Knowledge
